name: Swanson Tool Co S0107 "Big 12" 12-Inch Speed Square Layout Tool with Blue Book
short_description: Heavy gauge aluminum alloy with matte finish to prevent glare
1/4 in. and 1/2 in. spaced notches to facilitate scribing lines
Black gradations for easy reading
Patented layout bar
Great for deck framing and stairway building!
product_description: Product Description The Big 12® is seven tools in one: a framing square, try square, miter square, protractor, saw guide, stair gauge and out-of-square corner angle finder. It’s constructed of heavy-gauge aluminum alloy and includes the Layout Bar for use in determining out-of-square corners. Also included are the Swanson® Blue Book for roof and stairway layout and Layout Bar with hardware. From the Manufacturer Swanson's Speed Square is a popular pocket sized square that incorporates features of the framing square, tri, mitre, and protractor squares. Common rafter and hip/valley rafter scales permit one-number references for all cuts. The square is merely rotated to the proper roof pitch value on either scale to assure the correct angle cut. The slot along the scales will accommodate an adjustable locking pin for repetitive cuts using any 1/4-inch bolt and nut. Comes with a handy, 62 page pocket sized booklet that provides vital instructions, reference diagrams, and tables for the construction of roofs and stairs.

short_description: Rafter Square: Combines the functionality of a rafter square with two level vials and a bullseye plumbing vial for accurate measurements.

Adjustable Rafter Square: Pivoting arm with a locking mechanism for precise angle measurements. The machined track and 21 indexed angle presets, along with a 10'' heel, make it essential for any professional or DIY enthusiast.

name: SWANSON Tool Co S0101 7 Inch Speed Square, Blue
short_description: MULTIPLE GRADATIONS: Make the exact mark you need! Gradations Included For Marking Common, Hip, Valley, And Jack Rafters; Useful For Determining And Marking Angles And Making Square Cuts On Boards

FEATURES: Pocket-Sized Swanson Blue Book, A Comprehensive Guide To Help Workers Make Correct Angle Cuts For Any Pitched Roof, and it includes pages of inch rise per foot run data - meaning you don't have to do the math.
INCLUDES: Features Common To 5 Different Tools (Try Square, Miter Square, Saw Guide, Line Scriber, And Protractor) Making The Speed Square Something That Belongs On Every Tradesman'S Tool Bench

EASY TO USE: 1/4-In Spaced Scribing Notches And The Diamond Cutout For Easy Rafter Seat Cuts And Scribing The Most Common And Popular Stud Widths, and Black gradations against its non-glare, matte finish make for easy reading in any lighting conditions
MADE IN USA: The Speed Square, made in the USA since 1925, is essential for every carpenter, construction professional, roofer, and DIYer

SIMPLIFY IMPORTANT TASKS: Any time you need to ensure something is square, this Speed Square is the best tool for the job. It's also really easy to mark 90 and 45 degrees with this square. The Swanson Speed Square is the perfect square for every project and job.
WHEN USED AS A SAW GUIDE: The Speed Square makes truing up a board easy
product_description: Product Description The Swanson Speed Square was first developed by company founder Albert Swanson in 1925. This innovative tool combines 5 tools into 1: 1. Try Square, 2. Miter Square, 3. saw guide, 4. line scriber, and 5. protractor. The Speed Square is die-cast for durability and accuracy. Made of heavy-gauge aerospace aluminum alloy, it is built to last. Black-filled gradations stand out against a matte finish for easy reading. The Speed Square includes the Swanson Blue Book of rafter length and roof construction and also features markings for using the Swanson one-number method of rafter layout. The Swanson Speed Square is our most popular product and remains the most trusted square of its kind. Look for the Diamond cutout for genuine Swanson products. From the Manufacturer The Swanson Tool SO101 7-inch Speed Square is a popular pocket-sized square that incorporates features of the framing square, tri, miter, and protractor squares. Common rafter and hip/valley rafter scales permit one-number references for all cuts. The square is merely rotated to the proper roof pitch value on either scale to assure the correct angle cut. The slot along the scales will accommodate an adjustable locking pin for repetitive cuts using any 1/4-inch bolt and nut. Comes with a handy, 62-page pocket sized booklet that provides vital instructions, reference diagrams, and tables for the construction of roofs and stairs.

name: WORKPRO Aluminum Alloy Carpenter Square and Zinc-Alloy Square Ruler Set - 7 in. Rafter Layout Tool and 12 in. Combination Square Combo
short_description: Durable Material - The rafter square is die-cast from heavy-gauge aluminum alloy which enables it to last long and still give an accurate measurement. The combination ruler itself is die-cast from zinc alloy and carries a steel ruler made of stainless steel with a matte finish

Clearly Identifiable Scale - The rafter square finishing features low glare and protective powder coated. It has permanent deep markings and white graduations for maximum readability in any lighting. The stainless steel ruler of the combination square has a deep etching scale for superior legibility and long-lasting usage

Multiple Graduation - The 7-inch rafter square has many kinds of graduation which blends the features of framing square, try square, miter square, and protractor square. The combination square has a 12-inch stainless steel ruler which has 3 types of minimum scale values: 1/16”, 1/32”, and 1mm

User-Friendly - Lipped fence allows you to easily brace the rafter square flush with the wood, creating a straight or angled line that is proportionate to the wood's edge. The spring screw of the combination square makes it easier to detach the stainless steel ruler and the smooth ruler is easier to slide for your measurement

Wide Versatility - Easy-to-read level vial and a metal scriber on the side of the combination ruler increase product practicality and versatility. The rafter square can be used as a guide for cross-cutting lumber. They both work accurately at an angle of 90 degrees or 45 degrees

name: Swanson Tool Co T0701T0118 Value Pack 12 Inch and 8 Inch Speedlite® Squares—Hi Vis Orange Composite (High Impact Polystyrene)
short_description: This value pack offers an economical bundle of two lightweight versions of our Speed Square, and are made in the USA (since 1925), and are essential for every carpenter, construction professional, roofer, and DIYer
A true multi tool: acts as a Try Square, Miter Square, Saw Guide, Line Scriber, and Protractor. For what they do, these two Speedlite Squares belong on every tradesman's tool bench
Both squares in this pack feature our 1/8 in. spaced scribing notches and the Diamond cutout for easy rafter seat cuts and scribing of the most common and popular stud widths
Gradations included for marking common, hip, valley, and jack rafters. Useful for determining and marking angles and making Square cuts on boards
The beveled edge makes for ease of reading and making accurate marks
product_description: Winner of the popular mechanics editor's choice award and the retailers' choice award of distinction, the Speedlite Square is an all-around crowd pleaser. And this Value Pack includes the squares you'll reach for often: the standard 8-inch and the bigger 12-inch squares. These two Squares are lightweight versions of the Swanson speed Square and Big 12, first developed by company founder Albert Swanson in 1925. The innovative Speedlite Square is everything you know and love about the speed Square, but it’s especially great for use with siding and other delicate materials, since it won’t mar soft finishes. This innovative tool combines 5 tools into 1: 1.  Try Square,  2. Miter Square,  3. Saw guide, 4. Line scriber, and 5.  protractor. These two models are constructed of lightweight, high-impact composite material and are easy to spot from anywhere with their high-visibility orange color. The Speedlite Square also includes markings for using the Swanson one-number method of rafter layout. The Swanson Speed Square is our most popular product and remains the most trusted Square of its kind. Look for the Diamond cutout for genuine Swanson products.
product_details: Included Components ‎One (1) 8" Speedlite Square and one (1) 12" Speedlite Square

short_description: WORK FASTER & SMARTER - Save precious time on woodworking with our new rafter square. Easily measure, trace, and take angles using only one woodworking square! No need to bring a bulky toolbox. With our 6-in-1 carpenter tools, you have everything you need to work quickly and efficiently!

A WHOLE TOOLBOX IN ONE SQUARE - Our new triangle ruler isn't just any ordinary measuring tool. It combines six carpentry tools in one accessory, including a square, two protractors, three marking gauges, two rulers, a drill gauge, and a wrench. Your new all-purpose precision tool!

BACKED BY THE PROS - Our wood working square is made to last a long time. It's made of 4mm-thick aluminum, making it light and durable. The square features laser-engraved inscriptions that won't fade. If you're looking for an accurate and solid home improvement tool, our carpenter square is what you need.

A PRECISE 1/16" CARPENTER'S SQUARE - Need help plotting accurately or just not a big fan of standard carpentry squares? That's quite normal since such tools may not be enough to do the job right. That's why we made the 6-in-1 square measuring tool with 1/16" graduations. Amaze your friends with your accurate and exceptional work!

CARPENTER'S PENCIL INCLUDED - Thanks to our new 2-in-1 carpenter pencil, you'll finally love writing with a worksite pen! It features a removable grip, allowing you to write in complete comfort. The removable grip also lets you switch to deep hole marker mode in an instant.
